exchangeMarkets.name: New Exchange Markets

keys.name: New Exchange Account Key

processes.name: Multi-Period-Market
Multi-Period-Daily

javascriptCode.name: New Javascript Code
One-Candle Patterns Code
New Javascript Code
javascriptCode.code:
/* It is necessary to define Moving Average of N Periods to define the trend of the market. */
variable.lastN = [ ]                               // Define lastN array to record the value of the last N candle closes (SMA)
variable.previousEMA = 0                 // Initialize the variable previous enter to the main loop (EMA)
variable.lastMA = [0, 0, 0, 0]           // Define lastMA array to record the value of the last 3 and current Moving Averages of N Periods

javascriptCode.name: Two-Candles Patterns Code
New Javascript Code
javascriptCode.code:
/* Because this pattern has two candles, the properties of the previous candle are needed. */
variable.records1Back = [ ]                                                   // The properties will be record in this array

javascriptCode.name: Three-Candles Patterns Code
New Javascript Code
javascriptCode.code:
/* Because of these patterns have three candles, the properties of the previous 2 candles are needed. */
variable.recordsBack = [ ]                                            // The properties will be recorded in this array

/* Initialization Code*/

variable.prevClose = 0

variable.previousATR2 = 0
variable.previousATR3 = 0
variable.previousATR14 = 0

/* Initialization Code*/

variable.length = 14
variable.smaFast = 3
variable.smaSlow = 3

variable.signal = 0
variable.lastSignals = []
variable.lastSMAFast = []
variable.lastHighs = []
variable.lastLows = []
